title: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: The Help view does not start in a state where it can be immediately navigated via the keyboard. Users have to click on one of the 'live' areas before it becomes functional with keyboard navigation.
EB: We should start the Help view in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
SR: To reproduce the issue: Open the Help view and try to navigate using only the keyboard. Note that it is not functional until you click on one of the 'live' areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
